title: eye steak with Madeira sauce, onion rings, wild mushrooms and creamy mash
description: A proper steak dinner with all the trimmings, and we really do mean all of the trimmings!
ingredients: 300ml/10fl oz beef or veal jus or gravy
salt and freshly ground black pepper
300g/10½oz floury potatoes, such as King Edward, peeled and cut into chunks
2 small onions, finely sliced into rings
